label: A4BC7_hP12_164_2d_a_bc2d-001
title: MnBi$_{4}$Te$_{7}$ Structure
comments: The ICSD says places these compounds under the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hP12_164_ad_bd_c2d-001}{Bohdanowiczite (AgBiSe$_{2}$) structure}, which is true in the sense that the same Wyckoff positions are occupied.  We arbitrarily chose MnBi$_{4}$Te$_{7}$ as the prototype for this stoichiometry.
